name: Ninja Assassin: Samurai Creed
description:
Grab a chance to life the life of samurai in the medieval ages, fight epic battle for your kingdom fight enemies of the throne and save the princess from the enemy kingdom. Forge your fate with iron and pick up iron blade become epic ninja assassin and fight for the glory of the motherland save the princess and become the next king of the country. So what are you waiting for download one of the best ninja assassin game NOW!

Features of Ninja Assassin: Samurai Creed:
Medieval age environment designed for samurai fighting
Epic battle missions designed for combat missions
Exclusive super power and attack animations
Stealth attack and fighting combos
Amusing sound effects added
